name: Rapid Magic Arcane Crystals
description:
Enter a fantasy world full of intrigue and magic! Lead one of four playable characters on their quest to stop great evil! Discover new, intuitive and innovative magic casting mechanic!

FEATURES:
- UNIQUE MIX OF CASUAL GAME & RPG: Discover the fun & intuitive gameplay
- INNOVATIVE SPELLCASTING MECHANIC: Cast powerful spells by drawing them on the screen
- 4 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS: Each with their own extensive storyline!
- 10 WORLDS TO EXPLORE: Discover them on your quest to stop great evil!
- COUNTLESS SPECIAL EVENTS: Discover new, exciting gameplay mechanics!

Rapid Magic: Arcane Crystals, developed by Plush Pop Soft, is a unique and innovative mix of two gameplay styles. On one hand it is an easy to play, immediately fun & exciting casual game with intuitive, single-touch controls.

On the other hand - it’s a deep, involving RPG, with multiple skills to discover and powerful items to unlock and use in combat. You will get to explore 10 varied worlds on your journey gaining new abilities, equipping powerful gear and getting stronger and stronger along the way.

The key to progress is learning to cast multiple spells by drawing their corresponding symbols on the touch screen. Defeat stronger and stronger enemies on your quest by staying vigilant and always ready to respond with a quick flick of a finger!

Explore a vivid fantasy world full of amazing locales, dangerous enemies and creatures, and powerful bosses that you will have to defeat to complete your quest!

The single player campaign mode is full of game-altering special events that make you see the game in a completely new light. Discover all of the additional surprises and challenges that make the game fresh and exciting throughout!
